description: A German super sedan that looks like a business executive's daily driver and accelerates like a missile. The Storm AWD combines a twin-turbo V8, all-wheel drive, and an adaptive suspension into a package that does everything impossibly well.
lore: Kreuzer's philosophy is simple: why choose between comfort and speed when you can have both? The Storm AWD will cruise at highway speeds in perfect silence, then annihilate a straightaway at the tap of a pedal. It's the car that corporate executives use to quietly humiliate sports car owners at every stoplight.
